text: Gauri Sunil she was turning 11 but she wanted to celebrate her birthday at a different date because her aunt's sister's daugther's birthday was july 25 and gauri's birthday was on july 26 which meant the other girl was one day older and gauri hated that she was the youngest because all of her friends kept calling her tiny and sometimes even stangers she hated it so gauri decided to celebrate a birthday two times one time on july 25 and one time july 26 so she wont get mad
title: Saki
